trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around August 10th 2010
Summary: Sitting waiting for cross walker, looked up and there this huge object was sitting there. moved slowly behind trees.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy son and I was sitting on evans road, waiting for crosswalk to be cleared. all of a sudden there was this hugh solid object sitting there, it was moving to our left and went out of sight , we opened our window no sound. then it was gone. We both said did you see that? it lasted bout 2 minutes.
